document.full_text: a former payroll manager for bernard madoff's investment firm is expected on monday to plead guilty to charges he helped his former boss conduct fraud, court papers show.
document.title: ex-madoff worker set to plead guilty: court papers
lines_and_colors: a former payroll manager for bernard madoff's investment firm is expected on monday to plead guilty to charges he helped his former boss conduct fraud, court papers show.
